project_descr: Technical Assistance to Reinforce Governance in Environmental Tasks

outputs.output_descr:
The project aims at developing the administrative systems at the Ministry of Environment and strengthen its human resources in order to improve governance. The main achievements and results are summarized in below:
-Establishing a Quality Management System at the Ministry of Environment through identifying its objectives and, accordingly, design a structure for procedures and forms for the various administrative units in the ministry, and publish them on the intranet for daily use by ministry staff.
-Conducting a needs assessment for the Ministry of Environment and implementing an intensive training program based on the outcomes of the evaluation (training courses mainly covering administrative and financial matters).
-Disseminating management information about the Ministry of Environment through the website and publications.
